CloudflareAuthEmail.Description: Provide the email used in your account

CloudflareAuthKey.Description: Provide the API Key of CloudFlare for your account

CloudflareFields.Description: Provide a coma separated list of fields that you are interested - by default it can be empty

CloudflareZoneId.Description: Provide the Zone where your logs are

SumoEndpoint.Description: Paste the Sumo endpoint where to send the logs
